ValidationRule.description: Checks if Assessment Supporting comment is not blank before moving the stage to Development
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="International_Projects_Unit", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Assessment"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Development"), ISBLANK(Assessment_Supporting_Comment__c)
)
